title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 176.1 - Approved entities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 176.1 - Approved entities

State Regulations

Real estate courses and offerings may be given by any
college or university accredited by the Commissioner of Education of the State
of New York or by a regional accrediting agency accepted by said Commissioner
of Education; public and private vocational schools; real estate boards; and
real estate-related professional societies and organizations. No real estate
course of study seeking approval may be affiliated with or controlled by any
real estate broker, licensed salesperson, licensed or certified real estate
appraiser, firm, or company or franchise, or controlled by a subsidiary of any
real estate broker, real estate appraiser or franchise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
176.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
